Text: Played this game on Xbox 360, now been playing it on PC. I noticed the music while I played and liked it. This a great video game soundtrack, nice find on piratebay. My favorite track is \'Oppression Ambience\' Thanks ub3rl33t

Downloaded this torrent about 2 hours ago, It took that time but it was worth it, High quality sound, Fantastic songs, High bitrate and carries the official CD cover and full information, I was expecting to have to rename it all and add the files details and things but no, Amazing! 32 songs, 256KB Bitrate, Can't beat it!
